biotools.summary: CONSULT is a tool for contamination removal from genomic sequencing reads. Relying on locality-sensitive hashing, CONSULT extracts k-mers from a query set and tests whether they fall within a user-specified hamming distance of k-mers in the reference dataset.

bioschemas.name: CONSULT
bioschemas.summary: CONSULT is a tool for contamination removal from genomic sequencing reads. Relying on locality-sensitive hashing, CONSULT extracts k-mers from a query set and tests whether they fall within a user-specified hamming distance of k-mers in the reference dataset.
